name: Geeks On Tap
description:
As one of the first resellers in Australia, Geeks on Tap has assisted over 100 businesses in Australia, NZ and Oceania to make the transition to Google Apps, and provides them with ongoing support and consulting.
Geeks on Tap is also a reseller for cloud CRM systems such as Solve360 and Affinity Live and experienced with deployment and integration of marketplace services with Google Apps.
Our bespoke training services make change management easier and provides internal IT staff with an "instant deployment team" for fast and smooth rollouts.
READ MORE...
